unpublishSolutionModal.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Modal title for confirming solution unpublish
**UI Location**: Unpublish Solution Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to unpublish a solution
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Do you want to unpublish your solution?"
unpublishSolutionModal.body:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains the consequences of unpublishing a solution
**UI Location**: Unpublish Solution Modal (body content)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to unpublish a solution
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Unpublishing your solution will mean it no longer appears on your profile and can no longer be viewed under Community Solutions. All stars and comments will be lost, and any associated reputation will be removed."
unpublishSolutionModal.unpublishButton:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and unpublish the solution
**UI Location**: Unpublish Solution Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to unpublish a solution
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Unpublish solution"
unpublishSolutionModal.cancelButton:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the unpublish action
**UI Location**: Unpublish Solution Modal (action button)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to unpublish a solution
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
